code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{AreaChart,Area,XAxis,YAxis,CartesianGrid,Tooltip,Legend,ResponsiveContainer}from'recharts';import Papa from'papaparse';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function BenefitChart(){const[data,setData]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetch(process.env.PUBLIC_URL+'/data/benefit_predicted.csv').then(response=>response.text()).then(csv=>{Papa.parse(csv,{header:true,dynamicTyping:true,complete:result=>setData(result.data)});});},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ResponsiveContainer,{width:"100%",height:400,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(AreaChart,{data:data,stackOffset:"expand",margin:{top:30,right:30,left:0,bottom:5},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CartesianGrid,{strokeDasharray:"3 3"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(XAxis,{dataKey:"year"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(YAxis,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tooltip,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Legend,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Area,{type:"monotone",dataKey:"old_age",stackId:"1",stroke:"#8884d8",fill:"#8884d8",name:"\uB178\uB839\uC5F0\uAE08"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Area,{type:"monotone",dataKey:"disability",stackId:"1",stroke:"#82ca9d",fill:"#82ca9d",name:"\uC7A5\uC560\uC5F0\uAE08"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Area,{type:"monotone",dataKey:"bereavement",stackId:"1",stroke:"#ffc658",fill:"#ffc658",name:"\uC720\uC871\uC5F0\uAE08"})]})});}
